attributes.action: Legislate to curtail abuse of right to free speech of Media.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current campaign being conducted by the Media over Members expenses amounts to trial by Media in which anyone named irrespective of the true facts are automatically guilt.This is not acceptable in a Country where those accused are assumed innocent until proved guilty.These media witch hunts are becoming allto frequent and it seems legislation to regulate political  interferance in democratic government through distortion and selective reporting is necessary.
